Posts.Content: my PSA was climbing for the last 2 years from 2.9 to 3.2 to 4.5 this year. i have a family history with my fathers side. All the males from my father, uncle grandfather died from prostate cancer. Thanks for the great answers and support. my doctor has performed 400 Da vinci procedures and is the director of robotics at my hospital. Was thinking of active monitoring, however really do not want to go thru a biopsy every 6 months-year and I'm worried of it leaving my prostate.
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed with prostate cancer

Posts.Content: just received my biopsy results age- 55 family history of prostate cancer Gleason-6 after evaluating radiation and surgery i decided to go with the Da Vinci surgery. Does anyone know how many procedures your doctor should have done to be experienced in performing them.
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed with prostate cancer

Posts.Content: just received my biopsy results age- 55 family history of prostate cancer Gleason-6 after evaluating radiation and surgery i decided to go with the Da Vinci surgery. Does anyone know how many procedures your doctor should have done to be experienced in performing them.
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed with prostate cancer

Posts.Content: one core was positive. PTI 5% Right lateral middle
